Featuring a revolutionary modular design with interchangeable components and a powerful super-torque motor, this clipper delivers exceptional cutting performance with the versatility professionals demand. The dual voltage capability makes it perfect for international use.

name: GAMMA+ SKIN CLIPPER
shortDescription: Specialized skin clipper for ultra-close cutting and bald fades
description: The Gamma+ Skin Clipper is specifically designed for ultra-close cutting and creating perfect bald fades. This specialized clipper features a unique blade configuration that cuts closer to the skin than traditional clippers, making it ideal for bald fades, skin tapers, and detailed scalp work. The powerful motor and precision engineering ensure smooth, irritation-free results.
features: Specialized for bald fades and skin work

name: Cyborg Clipper - Professional Metal Hair Clipper with Digital Brushless Motor

name: Gamma+ XCEED Professional IN2 Vector Motor Cordless Double Foil Shaver (GP803B)

The cutting-edge motor technology delivers consistent power while the hypoallergenic foils ensure comfortable shaving on even the most sensitive skin.

name: Gamma+ Italia Uno Shaver - Close-Cutting Shaver with No Irritation
shortDescription: Super close-cutting shaver with no irritation, perfect for sensitive skin
